content.prompt: The impact of the Great Depression on agriculture in the United States continued which of the following trends?

choices.label: The demand for food resources from abroad grew.
The farm labor force diminished in size as the economy industrialized.
The need for immigrant farmworkers increased.
Support for conservation policies in rural areas declined.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
